mapper.select: select p.product_name as product_name, a.sale_price as sale_price, a.cart_count as cart_count, a.option_name as option_name, a.option_value as option_value, p.product_cost as product_cost from (select o.sale_price, o.product_code, c.cart_count, o.option_name, o.option_value from ar_cart c JOIN ar_option o ON c.option_code = o.option_code where c.member_id = #{memberId}) a JOIN ar_products p ON a.product_code = p.product_code
